title: Russia sets new deadline for Mariupol surrender; Ukraine troops there facing 'last days, if not hours'
content:
1. Russia sets new deadline for Mariupol surrender; Ukraine troops there facing 'last days, if not hours'  CNBC
  2. Plumes Of Smoke Rise Over Mariupol Steel Plant As Ukrainian Soldiers Hold Out  NBC News
  3. Ukraine marine commander makes last-ditch plea for evacuation from Mariupol  Fox News
  4. WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT - West sends aid as 'Battle of Donbas' rages  Reuters
  5. Russia invades Ukraine: Live updates  CNN
contentSnippet:
Russia sets new deadline for Mariupol surrender; Ukraine troops there facing 'last days, if not hours'  CNBC
Plumes Of Smoke Rise Over Mariupol Steel Plant As Ukrainian Soldiers Hold Out  NBC News
Ukraine marine commander makes last-ditch plea for evacuation from Mariupol  Fox News
WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT - West sends aid as 'Battle of Donbas' rages  Reuters
Russia invades Ukraine: Live updates  CNN

localize.title: ロシアがマリウポル降伏の新たな期限を設定、ウクライナ軍は「最後の数日間、いや数時間」に直面している。
俄罗斯为马里乌波尔的投降设定了新的最后期限；那里的乌克兰军队面临着 "最后几天，如果不是几小时"。
俄羅斯爲馬裏烏波爾的投降設定了新的最後期限；那裏的烏克蘭軍隊面臨着 "最後幾天，如果不是幾小時"。
